en_title: Secretary for Justice on sick leave

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, is suffering from intestinal discomfort and was admitted to hospital for treatment upon medical advice today (June 30). He is taking leave from June 30 to July 3 and will not be able to attend the flag-raising ceremony and reception for the 19th anniversary of the establishment of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region to be held tomorrow (July 1).
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師因腸部不適，按醫生建議，於今日（六月三十日）進入醫院接受治療。他於六月三十日至七月三日休假，將不能出席明日（七月一日）舉行的香港特別行政區成立十九周年升旗儀式和酒會。

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, is suffering from intestinal discomfort and was admitted to hospital for treatment upon medical advice today (June 30)

He is taking leave from June 30 to July 3 and will not be able to attend the flag-raising ceremony and reception for the 19th anniversary of the establishment of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region to be held tomorrow (July 1).
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師因腸部不適，按醫生建議，於今日（六月三十日）進入醫院接受治療
他於六月三十日至七月三日休假，將不能出席明日（七月一日）舉行的香港特別行政區成立十九周年升旗儀式和酒會
